abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Warpfire Trail
abilities.effect: Psychic, After moving, leave a 1 inch-wide trail of warpfire. Enemies crossing it suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.effect: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Aegis of the Ninefold Deceit
abilities.effect: Psychic, Reduces damage by 1 (to a min of 2) received by visible friendly operatives within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Ethereal Form
abilities.effect: Remove this operative from the killzone at the end of the turning point.

abilities.name: Daemonic Flight
abilities.effect: Fly over terrain.

abilities.name: Arcane Bargain
abilities.effect: Psychic, Once per activation: roll 1d6 and an enemy visible and within control range suffers result wounds and restore result wounds from friendly operative that it's both visible and within 4 inches, if an operative other than Summoner recovered wounds this way and Summoner is both visible and within 4 inches of this operative and that operative, restore result/2 wounds rounded up from Summoner.

abilities.name: Ethereal Form
abilities.effect: Remove this operative from the killzone at the end of the turning point.

abilities.name: Mark of Khorne
abilities.effect: Re-roll one attack die per activation in melee.

abilities.name: Warp-fueled Rage
abilities.effect: After defeating an enemy, gain +1 Attack on melee weapons until the end of the next activation.

abilities.name: Astartes
abilities.effect: This operative can perform shoot and fight actions twice per turning point, and can counteract regardless of order

abilities.effect: Psychic, Re-roll one attack or defense die per turning point.

abilities.effect: Worsen the WS 1 of Enemy operatives within 6 inches.

abilities.name: Psychic Smite
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: target operative visible and within 10 inches suffers 1D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Warpfire
abilities.effect: Psychic, Create a 3 inch hazardous zone within 12 inches and visible. Enemies in or moving through Warpfire suffer 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Disgustingly Resilient
abilities.effect: Psychic, Roll 1D6 each time this operative loses a wound. On a 5+, ignore that wound.

abilities.name: Swarm of Filth
abilities.effect: If another Nurgling is within 2 inches, improve WS by 1 of melee attacks.

abilities.effect: Psychic, When this operative is destroyed, all enemies within 2 inches suffer 1 wound.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Teleport 6 inches through shadows or mist zones. Treat as Concealed after teleporting.

abilities.name: Soul Hunger
abilities.effect: Psychic, After defeating an enemy, heal 1D3 wounds.

abilities.name: Umbral Aura
abilities.effect: Enemies within 6 inches worsen their Save by 1 in mist zones.

abilities.name: Terrifying Visage
abilities.effect: Once per battle: All enemies within 6 inches gain Disoriented until the end of the Turning Point.

abilities.name: Veil of Darkness
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Create a 3 inch mist zone. Allies within it gain Silent.

abilities.name: Siphon Essence
abilities.effect: Psychic, 1AP: Target enemy within 12 inches suffers 1D3 wounds. Heal equal to the damage dealt.
